traits.Fear Frenzy: The horror has advantage on attack rolls against frightened creatures.
traits.Sunlight Sensitivity: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d4 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) psychic damage.
actions.Frightening Screech (Recharge 5xe2x80x93: The horror screeches. Each creature within 30 feet of it that can hear it must succeed on a DC 13+1d4 + 11 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of it for 1 minute. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the horror's Frightening Screech for the next 24 hours.
